DOC.brief_summary: This study design provide short term efficacy safety data TRI476 child inadequately-controlled partial seizure . Patients randomize either drug treatment placebo group 1:1 ratio , receive respective treatment 8 week . The purpose study confirm TRI476 adjunctive therapy effective safe .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability TRI476 ( Oxcarbazepine ) Children With Inadequately Controlled Partial Onset Seizures
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient , age 4 14 year ( inclusive ) , minimum body weight 15 kg . A diagnosis partial onset seizure , include seizure subtypes simple , complex , secondarily generalize seizure ( base International League Against Epilepsy ( ILAE ) Classification , modify 1981 ) . A document history generalize status epileptic past 6 month . Seizures metabolic , neoplastic , active infectious origin . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
